Summary: Series of flashing pulsating lights in a straight line moving to the northeast
divs: sighting detailsi was closing my bed room windows and getting ready to leave my house whaen i noticed a horizontal line of lights (white) blinking sequentially. i watched for e few seconds and ran down stairs to get my brother in law, who was eating breakfast. we went out side and faced to the north and observed the line of lights moving away towards th north or northeast. there was no sound. the lights seemed to be at a high elevation as we observed a turbo prop aircraft (possible c2\e2) flying south and fly directly under these lights. we stood outside for several minutes and watched the lights fly away very slowly. at one time the lights flashed as if they were flashing around the perimeter of an abject, then they flashed from side to side.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Chesapeake
There were no other sightings in Chesapeake on or around September 24th 2013
